full_summary:
### Privacy Impact Assessment Specialist - Level 2 (TBIPS Stream 6 – C.16)

**Solicitation Number**: 202304366/A

**Publication Date**: May 8, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**: May 30, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Contract Duration**: One (1) year plus two (2) additional one-year irrevocable options.

**Security Requirements**: The successful bidder must have Enhanced Reliability Status (ERS) security clearance, verified by the Personnel Security Unit (PSU) of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP).

** About this Tender**:
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the services of multiple level 2 Privacy Impact Assessment Specialists to develop comprehensive Privacy Impact Assessments as required by various units across the country.

** Selection Criteria**:
Bidders are invited to submit a singular bid that includes two (2) named Resources. The work is not currently being performed by a contracted resource.

**Required Services**:
The selected bidder will be required to provide Level 2 Privacy Impact Assessment Specialists to support the RCMP in developing comprehensive Privacy Impact Assessments.

**Evaluation Method**: The contract will be awarded based on a competitive - selective tendering process, where the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price will be used to determine the successful bidder.

**Contract Details**:
The contract period will be for one (1) year plus two (2) additional one-year irrevocable options. The total number of contracts that may be awarded is up to three (3).

**Procurement Documents**: 
The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement. Bidders are advised that "BuyAndSell.GC.CA" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

**Contact Information**:
For inquiries regarding this RFP requirement, please contact:

* Name: David Repsys
* Phone: (343) 575-5298
* Email: [David.Repsys@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:David.Repsys@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)

Note: Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) method of supply is refreshed three times per year. For more information on becoming a Qualified SA Holder, please contact RCNMDAI.-NCRIMOS@pwgsc.gc.ca.
